dialogue.speaker: Agent
dialogue.text: Thank you for calling BrightLine Energy. My name is Stephen. How may I assist you today?

dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.text: Hi, I have a question about a charge on my bill.

dialogue.speaker: Agent
dialogue.text: I’d be happy to help. May I please verify your account number?

dialogue.speaker: Agent
dialogue.text: Thank you. I see the charge is from additional usage last month. I’ll email a detailed breakdown and suggest ways to reduce future costs.

dialogue.speaker: Agent
dialogue.text: You’re welcome. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?

dialogue.speaker: Agent
dialogue.text: Thank you for calling BrightLine Energy. Have a wonderful day.
